        public void setTile(SMPBlock block,
           int x,
           int y,
           int z)
        Place a block in this chunk.
        Parameters:
        block - The block to place
        x - The X cord. in this chunk. This value can't be greater than 16
        y - The Y cord. in this chunk. This value can't be greater than 16
        z - The Z cord. in this chunk. This value can't be greator than 16

               int y,

        Get a block inside this chunk
        Parameters:
        x - The X cord. in this chunk. This value can't be greater than 16

        z - The Z cord. in this chunk. This value can't be greator than 16

      • getWorldPosition

        public int[] getWorldPosition(int x,
                     int y,
                     int z)
        Convert the X, Y, Z position to a position in the world. For example: X-5 in the chunk may be X-21 in the world
        Parameters:
        x - The X position in the chunk
        y - The Y position in the chunk
        z - The Z position in the chunk
        Returns:
        An array of integers where index 0 is the X, index 1 is the Y, and index 2 is the Z.
